mapper.insert: insert into cart_items(user_id, product_id, quantity, create_time, update_time) values(#{userId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, now(), now()) on duplicate key update quantity = quantity + values(quantity), update_time = now()
mapper.select: select * from cart_items where user_id = #{userId} and product_id = #{productId}
select * from cart_items where user_id = #{userId} order by update_time desc
mapper.delete: delete from cart_items where user_id = #{userId} and product_id = #{productId}
